TextBlock.Text: NESIA: Hello. My name is Nesia. It's my understanding that you are the head druid of your people. Is that correct?
KARENIA: Yes, why do you ask?
NESIA: I was hoping you may be able to give some insight on the circumstances surrounding the rest of our clan. Is that within your capabilities?
KARENIA: Maybe. I can commune with the <color=purple>Bramble</color> enough to figure out their fates within its walls, but I won't be able to figure out what might've happened outside.
NESIA: I believe that will be sufficient. Three pods were launched from the <color=orange>Vessel</color>. Can you ascertain what happened to them?
KARENIA: Let me see... okay, I have the vines talking about your vessel and... yes! They're saying that objects escaped! They actually seem a little confused, that doesn't happen often.
KARENIA: Wait... oh. Oh no. I'm so sorry, but it seems like one of the pods didn't make it, I'm hearing talk of a captured object.
NESIA: No... Can you determine which pod it was? Who was aboard?
KARENIA: I'm sorry, but it's all jumbled, I can't tell anything specific without knowing something about the peop-
NESIA: Secca. Please, please, I need to know if Secca is unharmed!

KARENIA: I... I'm so sorry, but I'm hearing echoes of that name. The <color=purple>Bramble</color> only ever learns a name when it claims the person it belongs to. It seems that they were caught without air and asphyxiated.
NESIA: No. No, please, are you certain that she perished? There is no mistaking it?
KARENIA: I'm sorry, but the vines are very clear. Was she someone that you knew?
NESIA: She is... She was my love. I'm sorry, I. I can't...
KARENIA: Wait! Nesia! Where are you going?!
